actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 93-862.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-749.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to authorize the printing of a Veterans' Benefits Calculator.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that after the conclusion of the second session of the Ninety-third Congress there shall be printed 50,325 copies of a Veterans' Benefits Calculator prepared by the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs of which 2,000 copies shall be for the use of the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs, 2,000 copies for the use of the Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs, 37,570 copies for the use of the House Representatives, and 8,755 copies for the use of the Senate.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to authorize the printing of a Veterans' Benefits Calculator.
